prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a translucent body and long tentacle-like appendages.
Show me a blue aquatic creature that has a jellyfish-like appearance and red spots.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in the ocean with a round head and flowing tentacles.
Design a small, non-legendary Pokemon that resembles a jellyfish and has a calm demeanor.
Give me a unique Pokemon with a soft blue color and distinct red markings on its body.
Generate an aquatic Pokemon that floats gracefully through the water with a simple design.
Make a Pokemon that has both a soothing presence and a playful side, perfect for the sea.
